Beberapa siri peristiwa hebat mula berlaku kepada rakannya berakhir dengan pembunuhan "zehra" y suaminya untuk mengelakkan skandal curang.

programme.title: Muzium Misteri Ep10
programme.desc: Mengisahkan sedang Daniel, Shah dan Adam bersedia di perkarangan perumahan. Tiba-tiba seorang suri rumah bergegas datang melaporkan di dapurnya ada lembaga lilin. Mereka bertiga ke situ, lembaga kuali menyerang mereka, sehingga Daniel jatuh dan cedera dan perlu rawatan di wad. Bad datang memberi sedikit wang sagu hati selain memberi jaminan pihak insuran akan mengurus lanjut. Nur terus melakukan misi untuk bapa dan ibunya berbaik-baik. Kedua pihak kelihatan positif. Sementara itu Shah dan Adam terus memburu lembaga kuali. Setakat ini lembaga kuali muncul dikawasan perumahan itu, tetapi kedua mereka dipermainkan kerana lembaga kuali berkebolehan bergerak dengan cepat dari satu tingkat ke tingkat yang lain lalu menghilangkan diri. Kedua Adam dan Shah tidak putus asa. Suatu hari mereka ternampak lembaga kuali berehat di bahagian taman perumahan itu. Adam dan Shah mengambil kualinyadahulu. Kemudiannya mereka mensasarkan target dan berjaya menyedutnya. Kali ini misi mereka berjaya.Sekali lagi Bad gembira kerana muziumnya dijangka akan dilawati ramai lagi pengunjung.

programme.title: Operasi X
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang gadis kampung naif yang datang ke bandar untuk mencari pekerjaan di sebuah pejabat dan di situ dia telah bertemu dengan bekas mat rempit yang telah jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama. Dia berusaha untuk menolong gadis itu sesuaikan diri dengan gaya hidup bandar dan akhirnya gadis kampung itu juga telah jatuh cinta kepadanya. Walaubagaimanapun kerana sifatnya yang matang, ramai wanita mencemburuinya.

programme.title: Bodyguard Ep14
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Farish sebagai bodyguard pelakon Kasandra menjumpai telefon tangan kedua yang sealu digunakan oleh Mazlan untuk mengugut Kasandra. Farish memaklumkan kepada Kasandra supaya memecat Mazlan. Dalam kes berasingan, Nasha mengambil Bakri seorang bodyguard baru untuk menggantikan Rahul, pada masa yang sama dapat membantu Ryan menyelesaikan kes Haris dan Anuar. Ryan mendapati lokasi kegiatan haram Samad telah berpindah ke lokasi baru. Dia menjalankan menjual dadah. Sementara itu, Hakim dan Yasmin yang lari dari rumah. Semasa berkelah, Hakim telah memukul pengurus pusat perkelahan dan Yasmin kerana marah dengan mereka. Perhubungan Farish dengan Nasha semakin erat setelah Farish menghadiahkan bunga kepadanya.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: Selepas memenangi pertandingan pertamanya, Takumi menumpukan perhatiannya pada perlumbaan drift, sukan yang dia tanpa sedar telah menyempurnakan semasa menghantar tauhu dalam Toyota AE86 milik bapanya.

programme.title: Qaisy & Laila
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai cinta dan pengorbanan gadis Malaysia, Laila yang menyertai Malaysian Relief Team dan jatuh cinta dengan pemuda Afghanistan, Qaisy yang sebelumnya terpaksa menamatkan pengajiannya di Malaysia untuk menjaga adik perempuannya apabila ahli keluarganya yang lain terbunuh semasa Amerika Syarikat melancarkan peperangan ke atas Afghanistan

programme.title: Azizah The Legend
programme.desc: Hubungan percintaan yang tidak direstui oleh orang tua antara Azizah dan Ramli. Diapi-apikan pula hubungan mereka oleh Aziz. Melihatnya sebagai satu cabaran, Ramli pergi ke Singapura untuk mencari rezeki demi menghalalkan Azizah dan mendapatkan restu bapanya - kerja kerasnya berhasil namun lamarannya masih ditolak.

programme.title: Da Di Du
programme.desc: Badu, Badi dan Bada, bertemu dan menjadi sahabat ketika mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan seorang guru persilatan bernama Pak Tua kerana ingin memperbetulkan kisah silam yang tidak menyebelahi nasib mereka. Sepanjang itu terdapat pelbagai peristiwa yang berlaku dari mula mereka belajar sehingga tamat dan pulang ke kampung masing-masing untuk memperbetulkan masa lalu mereka.

programme.title: Kelisa
programme.desc: Bapa Sarah dibunuh oleh Zaid membuatkannya harus mengambil alih perniagaaan keluarganya. Tidak mengetahui tentang perkara itu, Sarah mendapat satu tender daripada Zaid namun tidak dipersetujui ibunya kerana tahu akan kelicikannya. Malang menimpanya apabila ibu Sarah meninggal dunia. Sarah ingin membuka semula kes bapanya dan membawa Zaid ke muka pengadilan dengan mendapatkan bantuan seorang bekas banduan.

programme.title: Anak Sulung Tujuh Keturunan
programme.desc: Megat Paji Alam memiliki sebilah keris ajaib yang diturunkan sejak turun temurun lagi. Anaknya, Iskandar Alam ditangkap musuh tetapi berjaya diselamatkan oleh pasangan yang menamakannya Hamzah. Dipecat oleh Megat Paji Alam, Megat Daka pergi mencari Hamzah. Tidak diketahui oleh Hamzah bahawa Megat Panji Alam ialah bapa kandungnya.

programme.title: Pendekar Helang
programme.desc: Diutuskan oleh Baginda Sultan untuk mengamankan sebuah desa yang sedang bergolak angkara pendekar yang jahat, Pendekar Helang sengaja mencetuskan huru-hara supaya tidak disyaki oleh Pendekar Daing yang kejam. Pendekar Daing sering mencuri harta orang kampung dan juga menculik anak dara sebagai tahanannya lalu mencetuskan kacau bilau kepada orang di desa itu. Sengaja melakukan perjanjian bersamanya, Pendekar Helang mengambil Sundang Panca Sakti yang dikatakan mampu membunuh pendekar jahat itu dari simpanan Penghulu Malim untuk diberi kepada Pendekar Daing sebagai muslihat untuk membunuhnya. Berlakulah pertarungan antara mereka yang menjadi kunci kepada keamanan di desa itu.

programme.title: Qaisy & Laila
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai cinta dan pengorbanan gadis Malaysia, Laila yang menyertai Malaysian Relief Team dan jatuh cinta dengan pemuda Afghanistan, Qaisy yang sebelumnya terpaksa menamatkan pengajiannya di Malaysia untuk menjaga adik perempuannya apabila ahli keluarganya yang lain terbunuh semasa Amerika Syarikat melancarkan peperangan ke atas Afghanistan

programme.title: Si Luncai
programme.desc: Cinta ditolak kerana pangkat dan darjat, Si Luncai, sang pengembala kambing pergi dengan harapan yang hancur. Dirinya yang lurus dipermainkan oleh Ketua Kampung - namun kejadian tersebut telah membawanya ke seorang nenek kebayan yang telah mengubah hidupnya. Si Luncai menyamar menjadi tukang tabib dan mempermainkan semula Ketua Kampung itu. Berjayakah rancangan Si Luncai untuk mendapatkan cintanya?

programme.title: Anak Sulung Tujuh Keturunan
programme.desc: Megat Paji Alam memiliki sebilah keris ajaib yang diturunkan sejak turun temurun lagi. Anaknya, Iskandar Alam ditangkap musuh tetapi berjaya diselamatkan oleh pasangan yang menamakannya Hamzah. Dipecat oleh Megat Paji Alam, Megat Daka pergi mencari Hamzah. Tidak diketahui oleh Hamzah bahawa Megat Panji Alam ialah bapa kandungnya.

programme.title: Serampang Tiga
programme.desc: Pak Guntor menghantar anaknya, Indra untuk pergi mendamaikan sebuah kampung dan bertemu adiknya, Naneng. Indra ditemani rakannya, Jalur dalam perjalanan itu. Setibanya mereka di kampung itu, mereka membantu Kiambang dan ayahnya yang diganggu sekumpulan orang jahat. Indra menemui adiknya namun dia telah mati dibunuh. Indra berjanji untuk menuntut bela kematian adiknya.

programme.title: Azizah The Legend
programme.desc: Hubungan percintaan yang tidak direstui oleh orang tua antara Azizah dan Ramli. Diapi-apikan pula hubungan mereka oleh Aziz. Melihatnya sebagai satu cabaran, Ramli pergi ke Singapura untuk mencari rezeki demi menghalalkan Azizah dan mendapatkan restu bapanya - kerja kerasnya berhasil namun lamarannya masih ditolak.

programme.title: Sayang Salmah
programme.desc: Semangat cinta akan bangsa dan negara diterapkan dalam diri Hassan dan Salleh selaku anak kepada Encik Jabar dan Dasimah yang inginkan anak mereka mempunyai rasa patriotik akan negara. Hassan, aktif dalam bidang politik manakala Salleh menjadi seorang pemuda liar yang suka berhibur. Segalanya berubah apabila ayah mereka meninggal dunia.

programme.title: Kelisa
programme.desc: Bapa Sarah dibunuh oleh Zaid membuatkannya harus mengambil alih perniagaaan keluarganya. Tidak mengetahui tentang perkara itu, Sarah mendapat satu tender daripada Zaid namun tidak dipersetujui ibunya kerana tahu akan kelicikannya. Malang menimpanya apabila ibu Sarah meninggal dunia. Sarah ingin membuka semula kes bapanya dan membawa Zaid ke muka pengadilan dengan mendapatkan bantuan seorang bekas banduan.

programme.title: Operasi Cegah Jenayah
programme.desc: Dua orang anggota polis, Shah dan Din telah ditugaskan untuk mengawasi satu pertunjukan permata berlian yang bernilai jutaan ringgit. Pihak penganjur juga meminta mereka berdua menjaga para peragawati mereka yang sedang bercuti daripada pertunjukan itu. Dalam masa yang sama, Crystal yang menjadi pengurus agensi peragawati itu merancang satu rompakan barangan berharga yang berada dalam pengawasan Shah dan Din.

programme.title: Pendekar Helang
programme.desc: Diutuskan oleh Baginda Sultan untuk mengamankan sebuah desa yang sedang bergolak angkara pendekar yang jahat, Pendekar Helang sengaja mencetuskan huru-hara supaya tidak disyaki oleh Pendekar Daing yang kejam. Pendekar Daing sering mencuri harta orang kampung dan juga menculik anak dara sebagai tahanannya lalu mencetuskan kacau bilau kepada orang di desa itu. Sengaja melakukan perjanjian bersamanya, Pendekar Helang mengambil Sundang Panca Sakti yang dikatakan mampu membunuh pendekar jahat itu dari simpanan Penghulu Malim untuk diberi kepada Pendekar Daing sebagai muslihat untuk membunuhnya. Berlakulah pertarungan antara mereka yang menjadi kunci kepada keamanan di desa itu.

programme.title: Cikgu Sayang
programme.desc: Seorang guru muda bernama Idayu telah dihantar ke sebuah kampung di Pulau Dinawan untuk mengajar sekolah orang dewasa. Di sana, Idayu telah digelarkan sebagai Cikgu Sayang oleh pelajarnya. Kehadiran Idayu di pulau itu telah menimbulkan perasaan cemburu kepada isteri para pelajarnya. Dalam masa yang sama, Idayu mula tertarik dengan seorang pemuda bernama Anuar yang tinggal di pulau itu.

programme.title: Qaisy & Laila
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai cinta dan pengorbanan gadis Malaysia, Laila yang menyertai Malaysian Relief Team dan jatuh cinta dengan pemuda Afghanistan, Qaisy yang sebelumnya terpaksa menamatkan pengajiannya di Malaysia untuk menjaga adik perempuannya apabila ahli keluarganya yang lain terbunuh semasa Amerika Syarikat melancarkan peperangan ke atas Afghanistan

programme.title: Rimba Malam
programme.desc: Sofea, seorang gadis jutawan diburu oleh orang-orang Farouk untuk membunuhnya. Satu kemalangan yang disengajakan telah membuatkan Sofea terdampar di tengah-tengah hutan belantara di Kalimantan. Farouk dan orang-orangnya masih memburu Sofea apabila mengetahui dia masih hidup dan tinggal di sebuah perkampungan orang hulu di sana. Sofea sempat menyelamatkan diri atas pertolongan Rafi, pemuda kampung itu ketika Farouk datang mencarinya.

programme.title: Da Di Du
programme.desc: Badu, Badi dan Bada, bertemu dan menjadi sahabat ketika mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan seorang guru persilatan bernama Pak Tua kerana ingin memperbetulkan kisah silam yang tidak menyebelahi nasib mereka. Sepanjang itu terdapat pelbagai peristiwa yang berlaku dari mula mereka belajar sehingga tamat dan pulang ke kampung masing-masing untuk memperbetulkan masa lalu mereka.

programme.title: Sayang Salmah
programme.desc: Semangat cinta akan bangsa dan negara diterapkan dalam diri Hassan dan Salleh selaku anak kepada Encik Jabar dan Dasimah yang inginkan anak mereka mempunyai rasa patriotik akan negara. Hassan, aktif dalam bidang politik manakala Salleh menjadi seorang pemuda liar yang suka berhibur. Segalanya berubah apabila ayah mereka meninggal dunia.

programme.title: Si Luncai
programme.desc: Cinta ditolak kerana pangkat dan darjat, Si Luncai, sang pengembala kambing pergi dengan harapan yang hancur. Dirinya yang lurus dipermainkan oleh Ketua Kampung - namun kejadian tersebut telah membawanya ke seorang nenek kebayan yang telah mengubah hidupnya. Si Luncai menyamar menjadi tukang tabib dan mempermainkan semula Ketua Kampung itu. Berjayakah rancangan Si Luncai untuk mendapatkan cintanya?

programme.title: Anak Sulung Tujuh Keturunan
programme.desc: Megat Paji Alam memiliki sebilah keris ajaib yang diturunkan sejak turun temurun lagi. Anaknya, Iskandar Alam ditangkap musuh tetapi berjaya diselamatkan oleh pasangan yang menamakannya Hamzah. Dipecat oleh Megat Paji Alam, Megat Daka pergi mencari Hamzah. Tidak diketahui oleh Hamzah bahawa Megat Panji Alam ialah bapa kandungnya.

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Gina dan Jo yang bertemu secara tak sengaja dan berpakat untuk memastikan Hardy dan Nita tak jadi berkahwin dengan bantuan dua lagi rakan mereka iaitu Lola dan Tompy.

programme.title: Jiran
programme.desc: seorang lelaki membawa keluarganya berpindah rumah di sebuah taman perumahan . Kehadiran mereka di situ tidak dikenali oleh orang-orang yang berada disekelilingnya kerana sikap sombong dan mementingkan diri . Lelaki tersebut bukan sahaja tidak mengambil tahu hal jirannya malah melarang isteri dan anaknya bergaul dengan mereka

programme.title: Jasmine
programme.desc: Gerak manja Jasmine menyayangi dirinya membuatkan hati Zaman berdetik mencintai Jasmine. Sayang telah bertukar menjadi cinta tanpa dipinta. Untuk itu, walaupun diusia 33 tahun, Zaman masih sendiri. Hati Zaman terguris kala Jasmine menyatakan cintanya pada lelaki lain. Awal segala-gala pada Jasmine kerana Awal cinta pertamanya.

programme.title: Mock 2 For 3
programme.desc: menceritakan sekumpulan remaja yang mencipta model mainan baru dan cuba untuk menjual ideanya ke syarikat besar tetapi tidak diterima. Id ialah pengganti syarikat itu, baru pulang dari Jepun. Dia mencadangkan syarikat itu perlu membina mainan baru di sekitar model yang ditolak sebelum ini. Syarikat itu tidak dapat mencari pencipta, jadi mereka hanya mengeluarkannya. oleh kerana melihat rekaan mereka dicuri, merka merancang untuk membalas dendam.

programme.title: Dari Kekasih Kepada Kekasih
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Hattan, seorang pemandu lori sering menghantar barang dari ibu kota ke Kuala Pilah. Setiap kali dia ke sana, dia tanpa henti akan berhenti di satu tempat memerhatikan bekas kekasihnya, Rita.

Traumanya semakin teruk apabila dia mula mengalami gangguan paranormal.

programme.title: Dollah Superstar
programme.desc: Seorang gangster veteran, Dollah yang selalu bermimpi menjadi pelakon mendapat peluang seumur hidup apabila pelakon popular memintanya untuk menjadi mentornya untuk filem aksi. Seorang samseng di lokasi penggambaran, Dollah pasti menimbulkan pelbagai kekacauan.

programme.title: Di Pintu Syurga
programme.desc: Jannah disuruh untuk bernikah dengan Faris oleh ibu bapanya. Faris adalah seorang guru seni khat. Suatu malam, Jannah terlibat dalam kemalangan yang mengakibatkan dia mengalami amnesia. Jannah jatuh cinta dengan Faris, yang dianggap sebagai seorang lelaki yang sempurna dan layak menjadi imamnya suatu hari nanti. Sikap Jannah juga sudah berubah. Namun, kebahagiaan yang dimiliki mereka tidak kekal lama.

Kebakaran hutan memaksa mereka melarikan diri untuk menyelamatkan nyawa mereka. Kumpulan itu sesat dan tersandung ke wilayah Myanmar di tengah-tengah peperangan antara tentera Myanmar dan penyamun hutan.

programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang ditinggalkan isterinya akibat perbuatan ibunya sendiri berjumpa semula dengan isterinya apabila ditugaskan menguruskan projek di kedah . Lelaki yang masih sayangkan isteri dan anaknya itu merayu supaya isterinya pulang ke pangkuannya

programme.title: Burung Besi
programme.desc: penyeludupan kapal terbang kawalan jarak jauh. Azri yang gemar bermain alat kawalan tersebut menggunakan kepintarannya dengan mengubah suai mesin terbang itu. Apabila dia melekatkan kamera pegun di kapal terbangnya yang akan mengambil gambar setiap 10 saat, banyak gambar keadaan sekeliling yang tidak dapat dilihat dan tersembunyi ditemui. Ini termasuklah gambar yang amat mencurigakan. Azri dan rakannya Leman yang musykil dengan gambar itu mula menyiasat dan turut dibantu oleh Irin.

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang juga seorang peninju berhijrah kesebuah negara lain untuk memulakan hidup baru . pada mulanya nasib tidak menyebelahi lelaki tersebut dan hidupnya berubah selepas menemui seorang rakan yang banyak membantu . setelah gagal mencari pekerjaan rakan lelaki itu mencadangkan dia menyertai liga muay thay secara kecil-kecilan .

programme.title: Kamu Tercandu Candu Gurame Cintaku
programme.desc: Argantara sedang berlumba motor ketika dia bertemu dengan trak pikap Yolanda yang rosak di tengah jalan. Akibatnya, Argantara kalah dalam perlumbaan dan menyalahkan Yolanda.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep165
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Star Ep105
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep40
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep120
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep157
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. programme.title: Detik-Detik Terakhir
programme.desc: Rangga disahkan menghidap kanser oleh doktor dan tidak mempunyai umur yang panjang. Hancur hati ibu dan Rian sebagai adik mendengarnya. Rangga yang berputus asa untuk hidup, bangkit kembali apabila bertemu dengan seorang gadis baik bernama Luna yang juga merupakan teman wanita Rian yang tidak pernah diperkenalkan kepada keluarganya walaupun sudah lama bercinta.

programme.title: Suster El Ep46
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep1

Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Agak Lain Mas Susu Murni
programme.desc: Mail pergi ke Jakarta untuk mencari kakaknya yang hilang, tetapi dengan tidak disangka, dia bertemu dengan Imah, jodohnya, di tempat kerjanya.

programme.title: Suster El Ep48
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Panji Petualang 911 Ep11
programme.desc: Tonton program Panji Petualang 911 untuk mempelajari tentang haiwan dan memerhati keunikan alam liar sambil berseronok dalam pengembaraan bersama Panji.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep50
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.title: Big Match
programme.desc: A man framed for murder battles a game planner who is intent on turning a city into one giant game board that he can control.

programme.title: Midnight Runners
programme.desc: Two students from Korean National Police University decide to work together and track down a kidnapping incident.

programme.title: Rolling
programme.desc: Juri with depression is stuck at home during COVID. As her mother went visit Juri's grandmother, Juri has to run their Kimbap restaurant until her mother returns.

programme.title: 1987: When The Day Comes
programme.desc: In 1987, a pro-democracy student activist was captured and tortured to death by the police. The authorities tried to cover up the case, but the ordinary people fight to reveal the truth.

programme.title: The Spies
programme.desc: Kim, a North Korean spy who had lived in South Korea for 22 years is suddenly contacted by his superior. His team plans to complete an earlier mission and steal the target's large stockpile of cash.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Swordsman Lee Nan hides in a village to escape from his enemies. There, he witnessed atrocities and people are desperate for help. The killer buried in his heart finally makes his appearance.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International
programme.desc: N. Korea detective returns for another secret mission. Despite having different underlying motives, 3 countries join forces to bring down an international crime organization.

programme.title: Gate
programme.desc: A group of five conspired for one last heist, yet secrets inside the vault are large enough to overthrow the country.

programme.title: Spellbound
programme.desc: Yeo-Ri has the ability to see ghosts. When she joins Jo-Goo's magic show, he offers to help her find a way out before the ghosts can chase him out of her life.

programme.title: Pawn
programme.desc: An unusual family is born as two ruthless loan sharks take in a little girl as collateral for unpaid debts.

programme.title: Take Point
programme.desc: An elite mercenary force get caught on a CIA mission which sparks fear of an impending World War III.

programme.title: Secretly, Greatly
programme.desc: 3 North Korean spies who have been living and bonding in South Korea's community for years got the order to take their own life after a sudden power change in their government. What would they choose?

programme.title: The Berlin File
programme.desc: A North Korean agent in Berlin is betrayed and cut loose when a weapons deal is exposed. He tries to escape being purged, while being pursued by a North and South Korean operative.

programme.title: Mal-Mo-E: The Secret Mission
programme.desc: During the Japanese occupation in the 1940s, two men work together to secretly create a dictionary of the Korean language when the language was banned.

programme.title: The Wicked
programme.desc: Sae Young is the new hire at a small office treated harshly by her manager. After picking on Sae Young in her backhanded ways, she soon finds herself the target of Sae Young's wicked ways.

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic "head-to-toe" plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.title: Miracle: Letters To The President
programme.desc: A math prodigy who dreams of building a small railway station in his village works hard to win the presidential math competition and present his petition to the President in person.

programme.title: Be With You
programme.desc: Before her death, a woman promises her family that she would return on a rainy day, one year later. Miraculously, she reappears before her husband and son but has no memory about her past.

programme.title: Beasts Clawing At Straws
programme.desc: Driven by their own desperate desires, the destinies of 8 down-on-their-luck individuals slowly converge and come crashing down while chasing after a mysterious money bag.

programme.title: Midnight Runners
programme.desc: Two students from Korean National Police University decide to work together and track down a kidnapping incident.

programme.title: Big Match
programme.desc: A man framed for murder battles a game planner who is intent on turning a city into one giant game board that he can control.

programme.title: 1987: When The Day Comes
programme.desc: In 1987, a pro-democracy student activist was captured and tortured to death by the police. The authorities tried to cover up the case, but the ordinary people fight to reveal the truth.

programme.title: Long Live The King
programme.desc: Based on a popular web-based series, a mobster meets a headstrong lawyer who he falls in love with at first sight and ignites a desire to change for the better.

programme.title: Steal My Heart
programme.desc: Hot-shot police detective Lee is out to get a hit-and-run driver and discovers the driver is his long-lost girlfriend from ten years ago. He tries to protect her before her crime record accumulates.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Swordsman Lee Nan hides in a village to escape from his enemies. There, he witnessed atrocities and people are desperate for help. The killer buried in his heart finally makes his appearance.

programme.title: Good Deal
programme.desc: The stories of worn goods that build bridges between people from all walks of life begin with a little boy trying to buy a second-hand baseball jacket from a former baseball player.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International
programme.desc: N. Korea detective returns for another secret mission. Despite having different underlying motives, 3 countries join forces to bring down an international crime organization.

programme.title: Swing Kids
programme.desc: The story of a North Korean soldier who joined the tap dancing team "Swing Kids" in the Geoje prison camp during the Korean War.

programme.title: Hot Blooded
programme.desc: A small and quiet port in Busan outskirt became the battlefield of local gangsters.

programme.title: The Berlin File
programme.desc: A North Korean agent in Berlin is betrayed and cut loose when a weapons deal is exposed. He tries to escape being purged, while being pursued by a North and South Korean operative.

programme.title: Gate
programme.desc: A group of five conspired for one last heist, yet secrets inside the vault are large enough to overthrow the country.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep458
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep5657
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each others back.

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep10
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep853854
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep682
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3383
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46734674
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep9192
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1835
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep956
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kits master, Debo.

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80s, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition to live the American dream.

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: In 1992, a heavy rainstorm caused a massive power outage in Hong Kong. Two young astrology enthusiasts, Moon and Sun, met on that starry night and fell in love. However, the path to love is not an easy one and they would need to endure parental objections and overcome challenges from teachers and friends.

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A commercial director Peggy shoots an ad on a deserted island while some mysterious men with the treasure map are also there to hunt for the hidden Ming Dynasty treasures. However, the map is stolen by Star who lives on the island. Star and Peggy unveil the hidden treasures but end up being chased by the mysterious men

programme.title: Love Â· Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the midnight gymnasium programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: Princess & 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: Seven Kung Fu masters live in Lucky Town, the only safe residing place in northeast China. When warlord Lam refuses to side with the Japanese, an agent is assigned to take over his army and kill his daughter using ninjutsu. Lams daughter escapes and seeks help from the seven masters, who finally defeat the enemy and save the warlord!

programme.title: The New Big Boss
programme.desc: A young man seeks out the Wolf, a legendary undefeated warrior. When he sees that the Wolf is now an old man, he prompts him to retell his past glories.

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the ministers conspiracy

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kongs Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Aberdeen
programme.desc: The Cheng family embodies a microcosm of Hong Kong, with its contradictions between tradition and modernity, superstition and materialism, family and individual. The movie reveals troubled characters dealing with their own issues in the city, from the eldest, Taoist priest patriarch Dong; to the youngest, the bullied elementary schooler Chloe.

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung is a fearless fighter who aligns himself with one of the two gang leaders ruling Guangzhou. However, there is more to the young Wong Fei Hung than meets the eye as he has a more dangerous agenda in mind.

programme.title: Phua Chu Kang: The Movie
programme.desc: Phua Chu Kang: The Movie

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Meis dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the childs unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Based on real events, the movie follows the footsteps of the fans of Hong Kong Canto-pop diva Anita Mui. After the death of the popstar, fans from different walks of life risk arrest to track down handwritten cards, letters and other possessions from Anita Mui to preserve their idols memory.

programme.title: Running On Karma
programme.desc: Andy Lau is a monk turned body-builder, with the gift of foreseeing people's lives. He befriends a female cop (Cecilia Cheung) and uses his gift to change the force of Karma and her destiny. The movie is ultimately a Buddhist parable about the nature of karma.

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Clouds successor as the citys guard.

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur goes undercover with an Interpol agent to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: During Tang Dynasty, two police deputies are tasked to catch the new leader of a revolutionary faction known as the House of Flying Daggers. They capture a blind dancer suspected of being the daughter of the ex-leader but both fall in love with her. When passion turns into hatred and loyalty turns into betrayal, love will be the deadliest weapon!

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the teams downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: The Trough
programme.desc: Yu Chau is a cop who has gone very deeply undercover within the triads. When he accidentally kills one of his pals in an operation, he runs off into the wild to lick his wounds. Upon his return, he teams up with fellow officers Jim and Jackie to catch a triad Boss, only to unveil collusion with government officials at the highest level.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderellas adventure has just begun!

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlords home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a polices son, blames his father for his mothers death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: To Kill A Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kams empire.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the familys young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huos stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Lis new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this young auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charns beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dongs concubine as he knows Dongs adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in the fight between the Qing and Ming camps and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his sons arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hons pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: A Place To Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: The Wandering Swordsman
programme.desc: The wandering swordsman Yu Hsieh Erh has formidable sword skills and helps the poor by robbing from thieves and distributing the wealth. He meets a group of bandits who are planning to rob a convoy escorting some valuables and is tricked into participating in the robbery. Yu soon realizes his folly and returns to take revenge on the bandits.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: The Trail Of The Broken Blade
programme.desc: Chivalrous swordsman Fung goes in search of another swordsman on the run, Li Yue, in order to reunite him with his love. Though both men meet and end up being close friends, Li Yue did not reveal his true identity until Fungs life is endangered by a gang looking for revenge...

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends help.

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: A former Monkey Kung Fu master crippled by a ruthless villain is convinced by his young disciple to teach him monkey kung fu, so as to avenge his shame.

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A Japanese karate master and Diao Er, who has been expelled from his martial arts school, return to the school to kill the school master and his disciples. After the massacre, disciple Lei Ming embarks on a vigorous training regime and vows to avenge their death. A fatal battle is about to begin

programme.title: Big Times For The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rongs hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.desc: Tamil romantic-drama movie starring Kalidas Jayaram and Megha Akash

programme.title: The Informant!
programme.desc: What was Mark Whitacre thinking? A rising star at agri-industry giant Archer Daniels Midland (ADM), Whitacre suddenly turns whistleblower. Even as he exposes his company's multi-national price-fixing conspiracy to the FBI, Whitacre envisions himself being hailed as a hero of the common man and handed a promotion. But before all that can happen, the FBI needs evidence, so Whitacre eagerly agrees to wear a wire and carry a hidden tape recorder in his briefcase, imagining himself as a kind of de facto secret agent. Unfortunately for the FBI, their lead witness hasn't been quite so forthcoming about helping himself to the corporate coffers. Whitacre's ever-changing account frustrates the agents and threatens the case against ADM as it becomes almost impossible to decipher what is real and what is the product of Whitacre's rambling imagination. Based on the true story of the highest-ranking corporate whistleblower in U.S. history.

programme.desc: Your TV screen is ablaze with dumbness! TruTV is counting down the 20 most laughable hotshots ever caught on tape. Our hilarious cast of hotshot comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey, Rachel Feinstein, and Chris Fairbanks have plenty to say about it all.

programme.title: Cop Out
programme.desc: Bruce Willis and 30 Rock's Tracy Morgan star as two longtime NYPD partners on the trail of a stolen, rare, mint-condition baseball card in the first major studio project from cult independent filmmaker Kevin Smith (Clerks, Chasing Amy). Willis plays the veteran detective whose missing collectible is his only hope to pay for his daughter's upcoming wedding, and Morgan is his "partner-against-crime." The two cops find themselves tangling with a merciless, memorabilia-obsessed gangster, rescuing a Mexican beauty with the key to millions in laundered drug money, and everything else that's not in a day's work for the detective duo.

programme.title: Aquaman (2018)
programme.desc: Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, the city of Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a vast army at his disposal, Orm plans to conquer the remaining oceanic people -- and then the surface world. Standing in his way is Aquaman, Orm's half-human, half-Atlantean brother and true heir to the throne. With help from royal counselor Vulko, Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan and embrace his destiny as protector of the deep.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep6
programme.desc: Crumpets - Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey find out how this great British treat is made in a factory that produces 432 million of them every year!

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S10 Ep4
programme.desc: Tuscany - In Tuscany, Ben meets British couple George and Sophie who have breathed new life into a farmhouse. George's desire to live self-sufficiently lead to a lifelong project.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep11
programme.desc: A mesmerising behind-the-scenes peek into the mega-industrial production lines of food factories. This episode looks at peanut buttercups and pasta sauce.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep12
programme.desc: In this episode we see how a leading chocolatier produces up to 500,000 bars daily. Plus, how cashews are used in the Indian treat known as kaju katli, and a peek at the production of pecan cookies.

programme.title: Earth's Great Rivers S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Zambezi - Follow the journey of the mighty Zambezi - Africa's wildest river. It floods across endless plains, fuelling the migration of 30,000 wildebeest, turning villages into islands accessible only by boat.

programme.title: The World's Most Luxurious Airline
programme.desc: With inside access to Singapore Airlines, this documentary discloses the lengths the airline goes to build a first-class suite for the super wealthy.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep17
programme.desc: This episode looks at how `Old Montreal' steak spice and roasted peanuts are produced on a large scale.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Singapore - Michael Portillo's railway tour reaches its final stop - Singapore. Michael walks the streets of Chinatown with a local artist and uncovers the history of the Chinese community there.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep7
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, an old WII detention centre is transformed into a gleaming new university, while respecting the old buildings beneath. And in Wisconsin, USA, and old polluting power station is stripped down and re-engineered into a spacious student facility.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep8
programme.desc: After the discovery of oil in the 1930s, the seas around Bahrain became damaged through increased shipping and spillages, and sea life was decimated. A huge engineering project was required to protect the environment and keep the trade flowing.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep3
programme.desc: How can a glass dome be built big enough to house a mountain? What happens when a major railway station is completely taken apart and rebuilt - during the rush hour?

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep7
programme.desc: In Singapore, The Pinnacle at Duxton is a stunning seven tower, 50 story, apartment complex. And in Brighton the i360 forced engineers to think outside the box.

programme.title: The World's Most Luxurious Airline
programme.desc: With inside access to Singapore Airlines, this documentary discloses the lengths the airline goes to build a first-class suite for the super wealthy.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep5
programme.desc: One of the several reinforced concrete highway overpasses constructed in the 1960s was Seoullo 7017. This deteriorating liability was transformed into an elevated green park by Dutch architects MVRDV.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep17
programme.desc: This episode looks at how `Old Montreal' steak spice and roasted peanuts are produced on a large scale.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep18
programme.desc: This episode looks at how Shanghai dumplings and fruit ice pops are produced on a large scale.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Africa - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores the continent of Africa - home to the greatest wildlife gatherings on Earth. But even in this land of plenty, wildlife faces huge challenges.

programme.title: Mediterranean with Simon Reeve S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Simon Reeve embarks on the fourth and final leg of his journey around the Mediterranean, travelling from Morocco, across the sea to Spain, and on to Corsica and the French Riviera.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S10 Ep5
programme.desc: Zambia - Ben journeys into Zambia to live with a British family who have built a safari lodge on the edge of a national park. In the process, Ben uncovers what motivates them to keep going in the face of challenges including fire and flooding.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Patagonia - Robson's journey continues in Patagonia, where he goes on the hunt for the massive Chinook Salmon.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealands Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Karst Caves - Squeezed between South East Asias two most formidable geographical barriers - the Annamite mountains and the Mekong river, lies Khammouane a rugged karst landscape, honeycombed with countless caves. These caves were formed by water flowing down towards the Mekong.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Kings of Nsefu - Twin brothers with a powerful bond have ruled the Nsefu pride for three years. Theyre fathers to all the young, and protectors of their territory. Witness the struggle that unfolds when rival males target their territory.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep4
programme.desc: The Lost Prince - When Mizumus status drops during adolescence, his alpha female mother disowns him. Follow his challenging journey to find a new clan while overcoming the threats of charging hippos, hungry crocodiles, a pack of wild dogs, and a hyena-eating leopard.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Head & Neck - Have you ever wondered why mandrills have such colorful faces, why vultures are bald, or even why hammerheads have, well, hammer-shaped heads? Discover how animals managed to survive by evolving from the neck up.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Mother's Tale - The jungle of Sri Lanka is a monkeys paradise. But not everyone here is equal. Anna sits at the bottom of the social ladder. And with a newborn baby, life is getting tougher. As drought grips the region tensions boil over. Anna is a devoted mother. But can she do enough to keep her son alive?

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Precious Waters - Life in the savannas of Africa is ruled by water. And throughout the long dry season, life-giving rivers run dry and harsh drought conditions prevail, making waterholes crowded.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snares Islands/ Tini Heke - Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealands Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Human Influenced - In geological and biological scales, humans have only been around for the blink of an eye, and yet weve managed to influence the evolutionary path for many animals. Explore the human impact on dogs, wolves, coyotes, elephants, and more.

programme.desc: Snares Islands/ Tini Heke - Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealands Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Karst Caves - Squeezed between South East Asias two most formidable geographical barriers - the Annamite mountains and the Mekong river, lies Khammouane a rugged karst landscape, honeycombed with countless caves. These caves were formed by water flowing down towards the Mekong.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Kings of Nsefu - Twin brothers with a powerful bond have ruled the Nsefu pride for three years. Theyre fathers to all the young, and protectors of their territory. Witness the struggle that unfolds when rival males target their territory.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep4
programme.desc: The Lost Prince - When Mizumus status drops during adolescence, his alpha female mother disowns him. Follow his challenging journey to find a new clan while overcoming the threats of charging hippos, hungry crocodiles, a pack of wild dogs, and a hyena-eating leopard.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Interior - Some of the most interesting adaptations in the animal world are completely invisible. Study these hidden, internal alterations to see how different animals have evolved to survive in amazing and unseen ways.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Eyes - Why do zebras have stripes? How do penguins see underwater? And why are a tree frogs eyes red? In this exploration of sight, discover how some animals have evolved to see extremely well while others have evolved to be nearly invisible.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Leaving Home - An ancient citadel once home to Sri Lankas kings has now been reclaimed by the jungle and theres a new dynasty in power. Monkeys.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Blue Lagoon - Nestled on the western coast of South Africa lies an extraordinary cove that is host to an abundance of marine and bird life. It provides ample food and spurs a life cycle that reaches well beyond Africa. This is the Blue Lagoon.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Autumn in Africa brings opportunities. Cape Fur seals, Samango monkeys, chameleons, impala, and more respond to the season. Autumn triggers changes in the lives of many animals. Rare creatures reveal themselves and predators gather to take advantage.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Nature's Crossroads - Thailand is a place of a thousand landscapes, dominated by lush forests, rolling hills and extensive rivers systems that feed into the mighty Mekong. Here the Mekong river continues its journey down the Eastern border, winding its way through biological and geological crossroads, sculpting the landscape and the lives of the creatures that live there.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Kings of Nsefu - Twin brothers with a powerful bond have ruled the Nsefu pride for three years. Theyre fathers to all the young, and protectors of their territory. Witness the struggle that unfolds when rival males target their territory.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Secret Life of the Flying Fox - Flying out of the Australian twilight is one of the most successful mammals on the planet the bat and one of the most gregarious of their kind is the flying fox. With a wingspan of more than a meter, the grey headed flying fox is the largest fruit eating bat in the country.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Secret Life of Mini Marsupials - While all marsupials share similarities, it is some of the rare smaller marsupials that highlight the fascinating contrast between them - and few small marsupials highlight these innate differences better than the quokkas and the quolls.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Social Animals - Cooperation comes in many forms. Some animals cooperate to be social while others put the welfare of the group above their own reproductive potential. See the many ways species have evolved to work with one another in order to survive.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Ancient Lineages - Some call them living fossils, but that's just another way to say survivors. From the shark to the horseshoe crab, these animals' early adaptations were a success, leaving them relatively unchanged for millions of years.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Trouble in Paradise - Relaxing among the ancient temples of Sri Lanka, tufted grey langurs share their territory with a troop of toque macaques and a group of purple face leaf monkeys. This is primate paradise. But a crippling drought changes everything. The three species are forced to adapt and take risks.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Chobe River - Deep in southern Africa, a mighty river snakes through untamed wilderness. Its vast flood plains are a magnet for wildlife. In the dry season animals travel great distances to reach this oasis and during droughts space and resources are at a premium. But every animal has its place along the banks of the mighty Chobe river...

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the seasons fury.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Thailand: the River Basin - Although the Mekong runs down Thailands far eastern border, the influence of the rivers basin reaches across nearly half the country. The east of Thailand is characterized by a complex network of the Mekongs tributaries. These waterways are the foundation of life for many different ecosystems; from extensive rice fields to large pockets of tropical rainforest.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Secret Life of the Flying Fox - Flying out of the Australian twilight is one of the most successful mammals on the planet the bat and one of the most gregarious of their kind is the flying fox. programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Memoirs of Acacia - Across rippled dunes, in the wind-swept grasslands of the southern Kalahari towers a magnificent Camelthorn. It has stood here for two centuries. This tree is never lonely, learn how it provides food, shelter and a hunting ground to many creatures.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sweet Seduction - Discover the story of the much loved Sausage Tree, whose nectar filled blooms and sausage shaped fruits entice animals of all kinds, from insects to elephants. See how the very animals who rely on this generous tree ensure its proliferation.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep28
programme.desc: Switched! / Free Range Chickens - Archibald and Cheryl accidentally swap bodies. After Archibald gives them a parting gift, he unknowingly changes their course in history.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep52
programme.desc: Lucky and the New Frontier (Part 2) - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.desc: That Thing You Dot / Where the Streets Have No Games - When Chevron bosses around everyone in her band, Dot decide to form her own band. The Harvey Street Kids become obsessed with a new video game.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep26
programme.desc: Tur-Bros / The Snailman - During a visit to a racing convention Turbo is kidnapped by an overzealous fan and it's up to the rest of the FAST crew to save him. // Turbo throws a wild race for his fellow insects, but is surprised when his old nemesis, Guy Gagne, returns for a rematch.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep2
programme.desc: Delivery Disaster / Slippery Business - When Donna's delivery truck breaks down, it's up to the crew to help Donna continue delivering packages to Harmony Harbor's residents. / When the crew takes on a mission to rescue a lost pet, Ellie must face her fears in order to help save the day.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep28
programme.desc: Switched! / Free Range Chickens - Archibald and Cheryl accidentally swap bodies. They must each go through the others daily routine, with Archibald pretending to be Cheryl and vice versa, until they can undo the mix up. / When the Strutters go camping, they find a tribe of primitive cave chickens. After Archibald gives them a parting gift, he unknowingly changes their course in history.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep71
programme.desc: Mi Amore Wing - Following the announcement of Dagur and Malas engagement Astrid questions her relationship with Hiccup. In the meantime the Riders battle Krogan over an unexpectedly placed lens

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants brain and defeat the nanobots leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants brain cells to the rescue! And when its all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.
